original_text: And unto Eber were born two sons: the name of one was Peleg; for in his days was the earth divided; and his brother's name was Joktan.
korean_text: 에벨은 두 아들을 낳고 하나의 이름을 벨렉이라 하였으니 그 때에 세상이 나뉘었음이요 벨렉의 아우의 이름은 욕단이며

sentences.original_text: And unto Eber were born two sons
the name of one was Peleg
for in his days was the earth divided
and his brother's name was Joktan
